titleStmt.title: An answer by an Anabaptist to the three considerations proposed to Mr. William Penn, by a pretended Baptists, concerning a magna charta for liberty of conscience.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold, by Andrew Sowle at the Three Keys, in Nags-Head-Court, in Grace-Church-Street, over-against the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: "Allowed to be published this 10th day of September, 1688."
Imperfect: tightly bound, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.

place.placeName: the Three Keys, in Nags-Head-Court, in Grace-Church-Street, over-against the Conduit
